00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 #include <fdo/Expression/ExpressionType.h>
00027 #include <fdo/Connections/Capabilities/FunctionDefinitionCollection.h>
00028 
00029 // Number function names
00030 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_CEIL   L"Ceil"    // Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the expression value
00031 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_FLOOR  L"Floor"   // Returns the largest integer equal to or less than the expression value
00032 
00033 // Aggregates function names
00034 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_AVG    L"Avg"     // Returns the average value of an expression
00035 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_COUNT  L"Count"   // Returns the number of objects in the query
00036 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_MAX    L"Max"     // Returns the maximum value of an expression
00037 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_MIN    L"Min"     // Returns the minimum value of an expression
00038 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_SUM    L"Sum"     // Returns the sum of values of an expression
00039 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_SPATIALEXTENTS L"SpatialExtents" // Returns the minimum bounding rectangle of a Geometry expression
00040 
00041 
00042 // Strings function names
00043 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_LOWER  L"Lower"   // Returns strings with all lowercase letters
00044 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_UPPER  L"Upper"   // Returns strings with all letters uppercase
00045 #define  FDO_FUNCTION_CONCAT L"Concat"  // Returns the string concatenation of 2 expressions"
00046 
00047 
00048 /// \brief
00049 /// The FdoIExpressionCapbilities interface declares the feature provider's level
00050 /// of support for FdoExpression classes.
00051 class FdoIExpressionCapabilities : public GisIDisposable
00052 {
00053 protected:
00054 
00055     /// \brief
00056     /// Constructs and return an FdoFunctionDefinitionCollection that contains a common list of
00057     /// function definition. Providers can pick the function they support and add them to their supported
00058     /// functions list. This method is internal to providers implementations.
00059     /// 
00060     /// \return
00061     /// Returns FdoFunctionDefinitionCollection
00062     /// 
00063     FDO_API static FdoFunctionDefinitionCollection* GetWellKnownFunctions();
00064 
00065 public:
00066     /// \brief
00067     /// Returns an array of FdoExpressionType objects the feature provider supports.
00068     /// 
00069     /// \param length 
00070     /// Input the number of expression types
00071     /// 
00072     /// \return
00073     /// Returns the list of expression types
00074     /// 
00075     FDO_API virtual FdoExpressionType* GetExpressionTypes(GisInt32& length) = 0;
00076 
00077     /// \brief
00078     /// Returns a collection of FdoFunctionDefinition objects the feature provider supports within expressions.
00079     /// 
00080     /// \return
00081     /// Returns the collection of function definitions
00082     /// 
00083     FDO_API virtual FdoFunctionDefinitionCollection* GetFunctions() = 0;
00084 };
00085 #endif
